sorts

Class MergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorts.MergeSort

  • public final class MergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
    MergeSort class is a utility class and contains all the methods required for a Natural Merge Sort.
    Author:
    Wesley

    • Method Detail

      • naturalMergeSort

        public static void naturalMergeSort(LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> list)
        Method that performs the Natural Merge Sort. It is overloaded for ease of use. This method will keep track of how long the sort takes.
        Parameters:
        list - A Linked List for sorting.

      • naturalMergeSort

        private static void naturalMergeSort(Node<java.lang.Integer> start)
        This overloaded method performs the Natural Merge Sort.
        Parameters:
        start - First Node of the List to be sorted.

      • naturalMerge

        private static Node<java.lang.Integer> naturalMerge(Node<java.lang.Integer> start)
        This method performs the natural merge sort. It first scans the data and splits the file into subfiles. Then it begins the sort and merging process.
        Parameters:
        start - Beginning of List
        Returns:
        node that represents a sorted LinkedList

      • merge

        private static Node<java.lang.Integer> merge(Node<java.lang.Integer> node1,
                                             Node<java.lang.Integer> node2)
        This is the recursive merging method that combines 2 sublists in a sorted order.
        Parameters:
        node1 - Beginning of 1st Sublist
        node2 - Beginning of 2nd Sublist
        Returns:
        node that represents a sorted LinkedList created from the 2 sublists

        public static long getTotalRunTime()
